name: Bubble Match: Bubble Shooter Adventures
description:
The most popular bubble match game combined with ocean adventure is coming for!
Totally different with normal puzzle game! Amazing island’s scenery, cute characters, variety monsters and fantastic ocean journey with twists and turns will immerse everyone into the adventure!
Throw other mindless puzzle pop games away! Let’s try Bubble Match: Bubble Shooter Adventures right now!!!

Features:
• A fantastic ocean adventure about a young pirate, a funny monkey and a cute parrot.
• Thunder Island, Mysterious Ruins, Gorgon Island, Purple Jungle and Underwater World, various characteristic island enrich your pop journey
• Variety funny ocean creature will bring endless joy for your sea journey: starfish, puffer, squid, shell, eel, jellyfish, canderland etc.
• The Medusa, Crazy savage, Captain Hook, little Mermaid, defeat different boss and experience the refreshing sense of pop and bounce.
• Experience the real ocean adventure full of magic and joy at home
• Extra challenge mode: endless challenge, endless joy. The more skilled, the more reward to get!
• Free & Easy to play but challenging to master. Just take aim, shoot bubbles and match the same to pop
• Connect to Facebook, invite and play with friends, present hearts to each other!

Already a fan of Bubble Match? Like us on Facebook for the latest news:
facebook.com/AEBubbleJourneyPop

Please Note! While Bubble Match is free to play and enjoy, some in-game items and functions can be purchased for real money. If you do not wish to purchase anything please disable in-app purchases.
